name: voice-transcribe-summarize-telegram-bot
description: Telegram bot to generate transcriptions and summarise voice notes
readme_summary: This Telegram bot uses Groq's API with Whisper and Llama 3 to transcribe and summarize voice notes.  It supports both forwarded and directly sent voice notes and provides well-formatted output to the user. The bot is built with Python and requires a Telegram Bot Token and Groq API Key.
key_features: Transcribe voice notes from forwarded messages
Provide concise summaries of the transcribed content using Llama 3
primary_use_case: Transcribe and summarize voice notes from Telegram using AI models

name: best-of-n-prompt-jailbreaker
description: This application implements the Best-of-N Jailbreaking (BoN) method, which focuses on exploiting vulnerabilities in AI models.
readme_summary: This repository provides a Best-of-N jailbreaking prompt generator.  It uses the BoN algorithm to transform input prompts, creating prompts that can potentially exploit vulnerabilities in AI models.  A web demo and a library are available for use.
key_features: Generates transformed prompts to exploit AI model vulnerabilities
Provides a web demo and a library for prompt generation
primary_use_case: Jailbreaking AI models by generating effective prompts through the BoN algorithm

name: web-player
description: MY PLAYEER — Бесплатный веб-сервис для потокового воспроизведения собственных песен. От разработчика DataSC3.
readme_summary: This repository contains a web-based music player application.  It allows users to play music from local storage and import tracks from YouTube.  The application includes features such as track shuffling, a sleep timer, and detailed logging capabilities.
primary_use_case: A web-based music player supporting local files and YouTube downloads.

name: E4GL30S1NT
readme_summary: This repository contains a Python-based tool for performing various OSINT tasks, including username and email searches, IP geolocation, and domain lookups.  It leverages several APIs (requiring API keys) to enhance its capabilities.  The tool is installable on Linux and Termux.

name: deepseek-r1-chat
description: chatbot made with gradio using opensource deepseek-r1 running locally
readme_summary: DeepSeek Code Companion is an AI-powered coding assistant that runs locally.  It offers features like Python code completion, debugging, documentation generation, and solution design.  The application uses the DeepSeek-r1 language model via Ollama for local model serving.
primary_use_case: AI-powered coding assistant providing intelligent coding assistance, debugging help, and programming guidance.

name: vite-react-tailwind-bionic-reading
description: Bionic ReadingTool -  is fully open-source, making it accessible to everyone. Convert Text into Better Way to Read Faster. ReadingTool can significantly increase reading speed by up to 30%.
readme_summary: This project implements bionic reading, allowing users to enhance their reading experience.  Key features include saving text as a PDF, Unicode character support, and adjustable font sizes. The tool aims to improve reading comprehension by drawing attention to the beginning of each word.
key_features: Bionic reading implementation to improve reading comprehension
primary_use_case: Enhance reading experience by highlighting the beginning of words, aiding focus and comprehension.

name: spack
description: A flexible package manager that supports multiple versions, configurations, platforms, and compilers.
readme_summary: Spack is a cross-platform package manager that enables building and installing multiple versions of software packages.  It supports Linux, macOS, Windows, and supercomputers, and its non-destructive nature allows for the coexistence of various package configurations.  A simple spec syntax and Python-based package files streamline the process.
key_features: Builds and installs multiple versions and configurations of software
Works on Linux, macOS, Windows, and many supercomputers
Non-destructive installations: multiple configurations of the same package can coexist
Simple "spec" syntax for specifying versions and configuration options
Package files written in pure Python
primary_use_case: Building and installing software packages with multiple versions and configurations across various platforms.

name: GoFreeDB
description: GoFreeDB is a Golang library that provides common and simple database abstractions on top of Google Sheets.
readme_summary: GoFreeDB is a Golang library offering key-value and row-based database functionalities using Google Sheets.  It eliminates the need for server setup and provides a flexible query language.  Data can be managed directly through the familiar Google Sheets interface.
key_features: Provides key-value and row-based database interfaces on top of Google Sheets
Allows data serving without server setup by leveraging Google Sheets infrastructure
Supports a flexible query language for data queries
Enables manual data manipulation via the Google Sheets UI
primary_use_case: Using Google Sheets as a database

name: Meerkat
description: A collection of PowerShell modules designed for artifact gathering and reconnaisance of Windows-based endpoints.
readme_summary: Meerkat is a collection of PowerShell modules designed for efficient artifact gathering and reconnaissance on Windows endpoints without needing a pre-deployed agent.  It's useful for incident response, threat hunting, and security monitoring tasks, enabling analysis of various system artifacts like processes, services, files, and registry keys.
primary_use_case: Incident response and threat hunting on Windows systems
